Name: Martin Alonso
description:
Martin Alonso is a coffee producer who lives in northern Nicaragua in a town in the department of Jinotega. He currently has a plantation of 1.93 hectares of land of which 1.76 are for coffee production.

Martin Alonso lives with his wife and three minor children who currently attend school.

This year he is applying for a loan so he can buy supplies such as calcium, boron, zinc and other products to improve the nutrition of his coffee trees. During the season he generates employment for 10 people in his community.

This is his third loan through PACSA.
